SELECT wum.USE_GRP_CD as useGrpCd, wum.USR_ID as usrId, wum.SEX_SECD as sexSecd, wum.USR_NM as usrNm, wum.BIR_DT as birDt, wum.CONN_TELNO as connTelno, SUBSTR(wum.SYS_RGS_DT,1,10) as sysRgsDt, DATE_FORMAT(wum.SYS_RGS_DT, '%Y%m%d %H:%i:%s') as sysRgsDtFull FROM WHMS_USR_MST wum WHERE 1=1
AND wum.${searchCondition} = #{searchKeyword}
